text: Ian Burden (born 27 May 1944) is an English former amateur footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Poppleton Road Old Boys, Dunnington, Ashfield, Rowntrees and Shepherds. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Bradford Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:York City F.C. players Category:Nestlé Rowntree F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ian Burden (footballer)
